name: Water Slide Park - Aqua Hero
description:
Today we brought you something really cool and wonderful – it’s your ultimate chance to become a superhero having fun in the largest water park ever! Try all the tubes and slides, choose your favorite colorful boat and fantastic superhero and do your best to win this game! Play this outstanding Water Slide Park - Aqua Hero and you absolutely won’t be disappointed!

Do your best and be afloat as long as you can, ‘cause if you crash or fall from your raft – the game is over! So be dexterous and wise and overcome long distance to make a new record! Get this ultimate experience of superhero’s free water riding and have fun!

Get ready to whirl and tumble through the water tubes with sharp turns and sudden descents! Choose your superhero to start this awesome race, collect interesting things during your ride and just enjoy this piece of summer! Do your best and control your speed to avoid crashes and just have fun! Play Water Slide Park - Aqua Hero game and have fun!

Earn points for successfully passed water tracks and unlock new interesting superheroes to play for! Buy new interesting tracks with more stunning obstacles and dizzy turns, rush into them and don’t forget to take your superhero’s cape off, if you don’t want to get entangled and crash!

Water Slide Park - Aqua Hero features:
• Awesome opportunity to have a great water slide being a superhero
• Wide range of different types of tracks and boats
• Many unlockable superheroes for more fun
• Enjoy fantastically great surroundings made in 3D graphics

Rush into the fantastic water park riding on a small boat and being…a real superhero! It’s your ultimate chance to join this funny atmosphere full of laughter and joy! It’s no need to use your superpowers – everything is so calm here! Play Water Slide Park - Aqua Hero and have a real fun!
